announcements.title: ADVISORY | 15 April, 2025
announcements.description: Cavite State University will adopt a work-from-home arrangement on April 16, 2025 (Wednesday) from 7:00 am to 12:00 nn. Meanwhile, work and classes shall be suspended from 1:00 pm onwards.

announcements.title: ADVISORY | 26 March, 2025
announcements.description: March 26, 2025 - NO TRANSACTIONS from 7:00 am to 12:00 nn. Transactions will resume on 1:00 pm onwards. March 27, 2025 - NO TRANSACTIONS.
